verses.name: Acts 18:1
verses.text: After these things Paul departed from Athens, and came to Corinth;

verses.name: Acts 18:2
verses.text: And found a certain Jew named Aquila, born in Pontus, lately come from Italy, with his wife Priscilla; (because that Claudius had commanded all Jews to depart from Rome:) and came unto them.

verses.name: Acts 18:3
verses.text: And because he was of the same craft, he abode with them, and wrought: for by their occupation they were tentmakers.

verses.name: Acts 18:4
verses.text: And he reasoned in the synagogue every sabbath, and persuaded the Jews and the Greeks.
